articles.title: Apple may launch mixed reality device this year — but we're not scared, HTC CEO says - CNBC
articles.description: Apple will likely launch a mixed reality product "very soon" — potentially as soon as this year, HTC CEO and co-founder Cher Wang told CNBC.
articles.content:
